body: Trox are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. Despite having no racial Hit Dice, trox are powerful creatures and their CR is 2 higher than a human of the same level. All trox have the following racial traits.
name: Trox

sections.body: Trox are very strong, but they can be dim, unreceptive, and inhospitable.
sections.name: +6 Strength, –2 Intelligence, –2 Wisdom, –2 Charisma

sections.body: Trox have a base speed of 30 feet.
sections.name: Normal Speed

sections.body: Trox are Large and take a –1 size penalty to AC, take a –4 size penalty on Stealth checks, and gain a +1 size bonus on combat maneuver checks and to combat maneuver defense.
sections.name: Large

sections.body: Trox can see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision 60 ft.

sections.body: Trox have a burrow speed of 20 feet.
sections.name: Burrow

sections.body: Terran. A Trox with a high Intelligence score can choose from the following: Common, Dwarven, Giant, Orc, and Undercommon.
sections.name: Languages
